Message.Title: Skywanker
Message.Msg: I'm the one blowing up your posts.. I have a new app that allows me to one-click you off the page. When you decide to say something interesting or even partly correct I shall allow it to stay up for a period of time. I hope this clears things up, happy posting.

Message.Title: I would be honored to accept the CEO position for $1mil a year.
Message.Msg: My first act would be to declare a dividend of $0.50/share.
